Title: Barista and Cashier - Ajax, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Goldies Cafe + Eatery
Thanks for your interest in working with us at Goldies Cafe + Eatery!
Goldies Cafe + Eatery is a modern experience with a focus on incredible guest service, and great food and drinks. Our people, both guests and partners who work with us, are the most critical piece to our business and therefore always our biggest focus with every decision we make.
Our menu is focused around sandwiches, soups, salads, flatbreads and pastries, and is constantly changing to meet new trends and rising demands. We carefully source every ingredient we use, and stand behind every item we serve to our guests. Our products come in fresh and the majority are prepped on-site each day. We’ve also partnered with people and companies in the community to bring truly local products to our guests. We also work with our suppliers to bring the freshest and newest ingredients directly to our guests.
Each day our doors are open, Goldies will be committed to creating a great place for the community to enjoy, and a great place for the people who work here!
Our Team Members
Team members at Goldies love hospitality and the guest experience, creating a sense of fun along the way for everyone that comes through our doors. With focused training and a desire to want to contribute to something bigger than themselves, our people are the life of the operation.
Here are some key details of the ideal candidate we are looking for:
Fun, friendly, and a genuine desire for hospitality and the guest experience
Passion for teamwork and a team environment
Willingness to learn and eager to develop and grow with the business
Open to honest and real feedback focused on development and growth
Ability to change quickly, and continue to innovate with the newest product trends
Focus on cleanliness or organization
Ability to work days, evenings, and weekends
Reliable method of transportation for all shifts
The Barista/Cashier Role
As a Barista/Cashier, you’ll:
Be the source of creating a great guest experience, and achieving flawless operations
Exercise your entrepreneurial skills and unique service and taking responsibility for your service, every shift
Create an environment of connected, committed teamwork through non-stop communication and the willingness to help others win
Work in barista and guest service focused roles which can and will interchange even throughout a single shift depending on guest demand.
What you bring to the team:
Strong passion for food & drinks!
The belief that people are the source of extraordinary experiences, and the desire to deliver exemplary guest experiences, every day
Ninja-status time and task organization/prioritization skills, a willingness to learn and an openness to feedback, coaching and mentorship
The ability to strike up a conversation with anyone, and communication skills that foster seamless teamwork and smooth-sailing-shifts
Required SmartServe certification to responsibly serve alcohol in Ontario
Food Handler’s Certificate currently valid in Ontario
The ability to legally work in Canada (as a citizen, resident or holding other current and valid work permit)
Please note we are looking for full-time applicants only at this time.
How to Apply
Complete your online application through Indeed. Due to lots of eager and skilled applicants ready to take their career to the next level with us, we will only be responding to those candidates who have been selected for an interview. Those candidates selected for an interview will be contacted through email and/or Indeed messages.
We are looking forward to reviewing your application, and thanks for considering joining our team!
